creditline: Gift of Vera Clark Place in memory of Lilla Belle Clark
description: chamber candlestick, one of a pair, with snuffers; sticks equipped with slides and set in center of rectangular tray with scalloped edge; rectangular, scalloped flange at top of stick; arm projects at bottom of stick with socket for snuffers; scroll shaped handle at side of tray with pierced arm, possibly for chain; scissors-snuffers with box fitted to one blade and a flat press to the other
title: Chamber candlestick
